progetto.view.commandline

Interface ICommandProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICommand, IExecutible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCLViewState, ChairSelectionState, CLCommandProcessor, CommandProcessor, ConfirmExitState, ContinueGameState, DefaultViewState, EndGameViewState, FrameSelectionViewState, GameTransitionState, PickDiceState, PreGameViewState, RoomsChoiceState, RoomsState, RoundViewState, ShowPlayerBoardState, ShowToolCardState, SocketRMIChoiceState, StateStub, UseToolCardState, WaitingState, WaitingTurnState

    public interface ICommandProcessor
extends ICommand, IExecutible
    A command processor must implement this interface
    Author:
    Federica
